name: common-denominators
author: Emett Speer, Eric Lakatos, twitch.tv/codephobia
description: A JS function that takes any number of arguments and returns an array of all the common denominators of any numbers supplied.

scripts.dist: uglifyjs src/index.js -b indent_level=2 -o dist/index.js && uglifyjs src/index.js -cmo dist/index.min.js
scripts.validate: npm run build:working && jest && npm run benchmark
scripts.validate:quick: npm run build:working && jest && AVERAGE=1 npm run benchmark
